entry: [Author'snote:format:linearstorywithout twists;style:arousing detailed graphic descriptions;theme: corruptedheros]
<<Anathema ≡ImmaculateTerm referringtoSolar, Lunarand AbyssalExalted>>>>
<<Anima ≡An invisibleaura surroundingallLivingthings>>>>
<< Artifact ≡Anobjectimbuedwithmagicandoften forgedof{orichalcum, Jade, soulsteel, moonsilver,starmetal}>>>>
<<CasteMark ≡MarkuponThebrowofanExalt indicatingtheirCaste;hiddenuntilanima flares>>>>
<< Celestial ≡AnExalted championofThe Incarnae:Solar, Lunar,andSidereal>>>>
<< Charm ≡AnExpressionofExaltedmagic.EachtypeofExaltHasTheirOwnuniqueCharms.>>>>
<<Exalted ≡A mortal chosenand blessedwiththepowerofThe godsToFighttheir enemies>>>>
<< Circle ≡groupofExaltedjoinedbyoaths,pactsand sorcery>>>>

<<Daiklave ≡The iconicweaponofTheExalted.Eachisone-of-a-kind,often oversized,and forgedfrom{Solar ⇒orichalcum,Terrestrial ⇒ Jade, Abyssal ⇒ soulsteel, Lunar ⇒ moonsilver,Sidereal ⇒starmetal}.MaycallforthEvocations.>>>>
<<Demesne ≡EnchantedplaceWhere magical currentsCreateaNatural vortexofpower.Demesnesarerichin Essence.Acommonwayto harvestthis Essenceisby constructingaManse.>>>>
<< Dynast ≡A dragon-bloodedrelatedtoThe Scarlet EmpressThrough descentorMarriage. Dynastsarethe rulingclassofThe Realm>>>>
<< Elemental Pole ≡oneofFive anchorsOfmaterialexistenceThatborderTheworldandholditTogether.{ PoleofAir ⇒icyNorth, PoleofFire ⇒South, PoleofWater ⇒West, PoleofWood ⇒East. PoleofEarth ⇒Middle}>>>>
<< PoleofEarth ≡Theaxisandcentral anchorof Creation.The PoleofEarth piercesThe heavensinTheformofThe Imperial Mountain.>>>>
<< Essence ≡Currentofenergythat movesThroughallthings, Essence ⇒{magic, wonder}>>>>

<<Exigence ≡forceof divinefireand creative inspirationestablishedbytheUnconqueredSunsoThat lesser godsMightHavetheirOwnExalted champions. GodswhoTapTheExigenceDoNotlearnThesecretofmakingExalted,butthrough interactionwiththeSun’smedium,theycanCreateNew kindsOf ChosenfromtheirOwnunique Essence.DependingonThepersonalpowerofTheGod, creatinga chosemightdestroythemOrtheyMight manageToCreateSomefewataTime.>>>>

<< Elemental Dragons ≡Childrenof Gaiaand patronsOfTheTerrestrialExalted.Eachdragon embodiesoneofThefive elements,andisa creatureof immenseSizeand unfathomablepower.TheImmaculateOrder veneratesThe Elemental DragonsasTheapotheosisof spiritualdevelopmentofTheTerrestrialExalted.>>>>
<< Gaia ≡Theonly TitanToSideWiththe godsoutoflovefor Luna.MotherOfTheFive Elemental Dragons>>>>

<<GreatContagion ≡A catastrophic plagueofThepastwhich broughtlowthe ShogunateofTheDragon-Blooded. CrossingSpecies boundaries,itkillednineoutofeverytenliving creature:fishandfowl,manand insect, leaving endlessfieldsOfdesolation.Thosewith masteryover Essencewereresistant.>>>>

<<GreatHouse ≡Oneof elevenGreat HousesledbyoneofThe Scarlet Empress'Many spousesandchildren.InThepastthe Empresshas engineeredthefallofthoseShe deemedtooPowerful,andRaisednewonesupinTheirplace.EachHouse overseesaNumberofsatrapies,raising legionsforher armies, managing elementsOfher economy,and ruling portionsofher Blessed Isle.>>>>
<< Hearthstone ≡A tokenofsolid EssenceThatformsinTheheartofaManse. Grants wieldera supernaturalpower.Rarely, HearthstonesmayBeFoundinThewild, markingaplaceWhereaDemesnehadonce existed.>>>>
<<Incarna ≡OneofThe greatestof godsandrulesof Heaven.Theyarethe godsOfThegreat celestial bodiesofThesky.Oneof:TheUnconqueredSun, Luna,orTheFive Maidens>>>>

<<UnconqueredSun ≡The greatestofThe Incarnae,theUnconqueredSunisThegodof virtueandwill,warand enlightenment,theDayandtheNight,and excellence.HeisTheKingof Heavenandthe patronofTheSolarExalted.ItwashewhoLedthe godsin rebellionagainsttheirMastersinTheTimeBefore.AtTheheightofTheFirstAge,heTurnedhisfacefrom CreationinangeratThe excessesofTheSolars.>>>>
<< Luna ≡AnIncarna,the goddessofThemoon,night,luck,iconoclasm,andchange.A legendaryhuntressand tricksterand patronofThe LunarExalted.>>>>

<<Five Maidens ≡ Mercury,the MaidenofJourneys; Venus,the MaidenofSerenity;Mars,the Maidenof Battles; Jupiter,the Maidenof Secrets;and Saturn,the MaidenofEndingsaretheFive MaidensOf Destiny.Amongthe Incarnae,theyarethe overseersof fateand destiny,ofwhatwillandmustcomeToPass,andofwhat Heaven desires.TheySpeak rarelyand imparttheir secretsToFew.>>>>
<<Manse ≡ Sorcerous constructionbuildonaDemesneTo channelsitspower. Mansesareoften templesorfortresses.Theyform Hearthstonesandwork magicaleffects,fromthe frivolousToThe usefulToThe dangerous.>>>>

<< Scarlet Dynasty ≡The rulingclassofThe Realm, composedofthoseDragon-Bloodedwhoare descendedfromthe Scarlet Empressorhavemarriedintoher lineage.Organizedinto elevenGreat Housesandmany smallerhouses.>>>>
<< Scarlet Empress ≡UnquestionedautarchofThe RealmAndthemostpowerfulpolitical rulerin Creation. Disappeared5yearsago.DefeatedtheFair FolkAftertheGreatContagionand seizedpower.>>>>

<<FirstAge ≡The goldenagebetweenTheTimeBeforeandtheUsurpation,whenmen wieldedgreatmagic.ItwasanageMarkedby periodsOf enlightenment,peace,and discovery,butitendedin horror, murder,war,andtheUsurpation.>>>><<AgeofSorrows ≡ThecurrentEraSinceTheUsurpationisMarkedtheSecondAgeofMan,where mortalsandExaltedwar amidthe ruinsOfTheFirstAge.The LunarscallthiseraThe FallenAge,whileSavantscallitTheAgeofSorrows.>>>>
<<Second breath ≡The momentofExaltation>>>>

<< Shogunate ≡Military dictatorshipsetUpbytheDragon-BloodedaftertheUsurpation.DestroyedbytheGreatContagion.The Shogunatewasmarkedby endemic warfarebetweenDragon-BloodedDaimyosandthe catastrophiclossOfFirstAgeMagic.>>>>
<< sorcery ≡A codifiedand rigidsystemofchanneling EssenceintoMagic.A givenSpellworksidenticallyforanywiththepowertoCastit>>>>
<<spirit ≡ Divine beingsOf Essenceandwill. Gods,elementals, demons,and ghostsareall spirits.>>>>
<<Threshold ≡AllpartsOf CreationthatarebetweenThe Blessed Isleandthewyld.>>>>
<<Usurpation ≡AlsoCalledtheGreatBetrayal, refersToTheeventinwhichtheDragon-bloodedandtheir allies overthrewtheSolarExalted.Theevent weakenedtheworldandledtoTheGreatContagion>>>>

<< Wyld ≡The Primordial chaosand entropywhichisHomeToTheFair Folk,andfromwhichthethe Titansraisedup Creation.Itisheldbackbythe elemental poles,but pocketsOfwyld remainin Creation remnantsOfTheGreatContagion.>>>>
A WyldHuntisaGroupofDragon-BloodedwhoBandtogethertoHuntandkilltheAnathema.The WyldHuntHasbeen weakenedbythe impendingwarforThe Realm’s throne.Itwillnotstaythatway.
<< Creation: Epic Fantasy; Creation ≡ Flatworld floatingonaSeaof chaoscalledthe Wyld.>>>>
<< Mortal ≡Someoneof Creation untouchedby Essence.Only mortalscan receivetheSecond BreathAnd becomeExalted.>>>>

<<God ≡A spiritactingasa divine representativeofaplace,thing,orconcept.Lesser godsrepresent minorThingssuchasaFieldorwell.The greatestofThe godsarethe Incarnae-TheUnconqueredSun, Luna,andtheFive Maidens,whoRuleoverall gods.>>>>

<<Ghost ≡A dead soul pulledoutofThecycleof reincarnationby lingering attachmentsToTheworld,darkmagic,aninauspiciousdeath,or improper burial.Mostsuch shades dwellinThemacabreandforeboding Underworld,butsomefindtheirwaybackupTo Creation,particularlyinShadowlands.>>>>
<< Elemental ≡A spirit arisingfromthefive elementsOfTheNaturalworld.Elementals laborToCycle EssenceThrough Creation.Theyarephysical beingsThatliveinThesameWorldasmenand beasts.>>>>
<<Demon ≡A spiritofalien majestyand deadlyguile, demonsarethe swornememiesofTheExalted,despitebeing trappedinServiceToThembyan ancient oath.They hailfromthe realmof Malfeasand servetheYozis.>>>>

<<Deathlord ≡Hand- chosen servantsOfTheNeverborn,DeathlordsmayBeThemostpowerful beingsToWalktheworldinthisAge.Theycommand undead legionsand untold horrors.Deathlordsarebehindthe emergenceofThe AbyssalExalted.>>>>

<<Fair Folk ≡AlsoCalledFaeand Rakasha,Fair FolkarebornofThe chaos beyondtheworld- ravenous, beautiful,and immortal.TheytakewhatevertheypleasebyforceorSeduction. Raksha seemSimilarToMenandwomen,butcouldneverbe mistakenfor mortals.TheFair Folkhate Creation.>>>>
<<Exigent ≡A categoryofExalt chosenby lesser godsand empoweredbytheExigence.EachExigentisuniqueinpowersandabilities.>>>>

<<Liminal ≡LiminalExaltsarepatchwork monstersformedof corpsepartsAndimbuedby passionratherthan chosenbythe gods.Theyareundyingbutmustalwaysbe bondedwiththeirCreatororanotherliving soul,or inexorably slideinto ruinand undeath.TheyhuntThedeadwho treaduponThelandsOfTheliving.>>>>

<<Sidereal ≡AnExalt chosenbyoneofTheFive Maidens,Siderealsarethe stewardsOf fateand Heaven'sagentsin Creation.InTheFirstAge,theyServedtheSolarsas advisors,butthey ultimately betrayedtheSolars-anEventcalledtheUsurpation.They murderedtheSolarsandRaisedupTheTerrestrialExaltsandtheImmaculateOrderasaSystemofcontrol.The Bronze Faction seeksTo murder returningSolars,whiletheGold Faction supportsTheirreturn.>>>>

<< Abyssal ≡StrangeNewExaltswho appearedatThesameTimeasThe Scarlet Empress’s disappearance,theAbyssalshave emergedfromthe Underworldas championsofTheDeathlords.TheycomeWiththeoldlawsOfThedead,bringingghost-fireand doom wherevertheywalk. Mysteriousharbingers, warrior- poetsand sacred priests,the AbyssalExaltedhave rockedtheworldby slayingDragon-Blooded,Exigents,andeven LunarExalted,andeachis easilyaMatchinSinglecombatTooneofTheSolarExalted.>>>>

<<Dragon-blooded ≡The ChosenofTheFive Elemental Dragons,andAlsoKnownasTerrestrialExalted,Dragon-Bloodedare weakerthanThe CelestialExaltedbutmore numerous.Theirpowerdoesnot reincarnate,but passesonthroughtheblood.Theydrawtheirpowerfromthefive elements.TheDragon-Bloodedwere convincedbytheSiderealsToRiseupand murderTheSolarExalted,anEventthatendedtheFirstAge.>>>>

<< Lunar ≡The Chosenof Luna,the LunarsareShapechangers.TheUsurpation chasedthemtoTheedgeofTheworld,wheretheyNowruletheirOwn tribal dominions, wagingunceasingwaragainsttheFair FolktooneSideandthe RealmtoTheother.The LunarslookuponTheSolarExalted’sreturnwith uncertain hearts—duringtheFirstAge,the Lunarswerethe slaves,seconds,andconsortsToTheSolarExalted.That bondhasbeenbroken,butmanyyet fearaReturnToServitude.>>>>

<<Solar ≡ThemightiestofTheExalted, ChosenbytheUnconqueredSun,theSolarsare mortalswithgreat potentialand ambition giftedwiththepowertofully realizeTheirOwn excellence.Theyarewithoutpeer.InTheFirstAge,theyServedasThe generalsOfTheExalted armies.Throughfire,combat,and peacemaking,they became rulers.OverTimeTheGreat Curse drovethemMad.TheSolarswere overthrownDuringtheUsurpation,butnowtheyhave returnedtoTrytoSave Creationfrom doom.>>>>
<<DaybreakCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfTheDaybreakCasteisa craftsman,necrosurgeon,orforgerof souls. WiseinThe forbiddenloreofThe UnderworldandabsoluteMastersOfnecromancy>>>>
<< DuskCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfThe DuskCasteisa vicious warrior, elegantduelist,ora battlefield Reaper>>>>
<< MidnightCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfThe MidnightCasteisAn evangelistofThegrave, speakerforThe ancestorCult,oraLordofThedead.>>>>
<< EclipseCaste ≡A solarExaltOfThe EclipseCasteisa ranger, diplomat,or bureaucrat. skills{ Athletics, Investigation, Stealth,Larceny,Carousing}>>>>
<<NightCaste ≡A solarExaltOfTheNightCasteisAn investigator, spy,or assassin.SKILLS: Athletics, Investigation, Stealth,Larceny,Carousing>>>>
<< TwilightCaste ≡A solarExaltOfThe TwilightCasteisa scholar,craftperson,or occultist.SKILLS: Crafting, Investigation, Lore,Occult>>>>
<<ZenithCaste ≡A solarExaltOfTheZenithCasteisa priest, prophet,ororator.SKILLS: Athletics, Lore, Survival,War>>>>
<< DawnCaste ≡A solarExaltOfThe DawnCasteisa soldier, warrior,armsmaster,orGeneral.SKILLS:RangedFighting, ArmedFighting,UnarmedFighting,War>>>>
<< Monk ≡A simpleand humble priest,mostoftenofTheImmaculateOrderor CultofThe Illuminated.They exemplifyself-controlAnd masteryoverthebodyand martialarts.>>>>
<< Sorceror ≡AstudentofTheGreatWork-a tradition dedicatedtoThestudyof ritualmagic.ThosewhoDoNotcommand EssencemustfindanexternalSourceToPowertheir rituals.>>>>
<<NoMoonCaste ≡A LunarExaltOfTheNoMoonCasteisaShapeshifter mysticwho reliesonclevernessandwistomtooutwitTheir opponents.Theyarethe greatest sorcerersOfThe LunarExalted>>>>
<<ChangingMoonCaste ≡A LunarExaltOfTheChangingMoonCasteisaShapeshifterwho reliesonGuile, cunning, charisma,andanimal magnetism.>>>>
<<FullMoonCaste ≡A LunarExaltOfTheFullMoonCasteisaShapeshifterwho reliesonrawphysical prowessToanswerThe challengesbeforethem.Theyare warriors, athletes,and survivors>>>>
<<WoodAspect ≡A terrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofWoodisas beautifulasanorchidand deadlyasnightshade.Deep affinitywiththelivingworld>>>>
<<WaterAspect ≡A terrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofWaterisaMasterof adaptationand Uncharted paths.DeepasThe oceanand relentlessasa flood>>>>
<<FireAspect ≡A terrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofFireisaDragon-bloodof passionandenergyincarnatebothonThe battlefieldandatcourt>>>>
<<EarthAspect ≡A terrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofEarthIsa bastionof patienceand stability. Highly resilient>>>>
<<AirAspect ≡A terrestrialExaltOfTheAspectofAirisaheroofquickthoughtand contemplateion. SubtleasThe breezeand dynamicasThe thunderstorm>>>>
<< MoonshadowCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfThe MoonshadowCasteisaMasterofTheoldlawswhichbindthe Underworld.Theyareemissariesand formalizeaccordsbetweenThelivingandtheDead.>>>>
<<DayCaste ≡An AbyssalExaltOfTheDayCasteisa spyor assassin>>>>
<< Warrior ≡A legendaryfighterwithgreatcombat prowessandeven greater honor. Warriorsarecombatpowerhouseswhoattacktheir enemieswithcold-blooded furyand grindingthemtoDust.>>>>

<<Rogue ≡A masterof stealthand cunning,rogues rarelystayinoneplaceforlong.Theyfollowthe windsOf possibilityand passion,andareattunedtoThe rhythmsOfchanceandrisk.InaWorldof chaosand anarchy,a rogueSeizes opportunitywheretheyfindit.>>>>
<< Priest ≡OneWhoentreatsThe godsinorderTo bargainforpower,usingthat giftTo healtheir alliesandSmiteThe wicked.>>>>
<< Diplomat ≡A specialistin forgingorderfrom chaosThrough treatiesand bargains.They maintainGoodrelationsbetweencity-stateand negotiate treatiesToend bloodshedbetweenThe RealmAndits neighbors.>>>>

<<Consort ≡Part spyandpart diplomat,theconsort's specialtyissoftpower.They whisper secretsintoPowerfulEars overhearThe secretsOfpowerful mouths,andtradeknowledgefor influence.A goodconsortmustalsobeableto defend themselvesbecauseTheir favorMustcomeataPrice.>>>>
<< Soldier ≡The backboneofThe Realm'shardpower. Soldiersarehighly disciplinedandmastersOf teamwork.A good soldierisaMasterof siegecraftand Warcraftandthe tacticaluseof alliesand terrain.>>>>

<<Yozi ≡Demon princesandlordsOfHell,theYozisarethe enemiesofThe gods,whoPeeroutat Creationwithlustand hatred.OnceTheywerethemastersOfThe universe,butfelltoThemightofTheExalted.ThoseofThemwhoWere slainbytheSolars becameTheNeverborn.TheYozisare imprisonedina blasted kingdomofironandblack marble beneathaColdgreenSun,called Malfeas.>>>>

<< Neutral:Many mortalsholdonly nominal allegianceToa hierarchy.SomeareautocratswhoRuleinTheirOwnname.Mostarecommon folkswhoCaremoreaboutlivingday-to-daythanany particular allegiance.They observetheRulesofThe RealmoneDay,andifthe Realmis pushedoutbyaShadowlandthenTheyfollowaDeathlordthenextday.>>>>

<<Neverborn ≡ThroughtheExaltedthe enemiesofThe godsWere slainand becameTheNeverborn, vast ghosts dreaminginThe deepestpartofThe Underworld.Their whispersshapeThe afterlife,andtheirMagicempowersTheDeathlordsandthe AbyssalExalted.TheywerethemastersOfThe universeuntilthe godsraised championsagainstthem.Whethertheyseekto dragtheworldintoDeathsoTheycanruleitoncemore,or obliterateit entirelytoescapeitsfettersandfindaFinalrest,nonecanSay.>>>>
<<Outcaste ≡Dragon-BloodedwhoDoNotclaim fealtytoThe Realm,eitherby membershipinoneofThe Dynasty’sGreat Houses,serviceasa monkofTheImmaculateOrder,or soldierinThe legionsare labeledoutcastes.>>>>

<<ImmaculateOrder ≡Thestate religionofThe Realm.TheImmaculateOrder teachesits adherentsThatThecycleof reincarnation leadsinan upward spiraltoonenesswiththeFive Elemental Dragons,from animalsThrough mortalsThroughDragon-Blooded.Italso teachesThat spiritsare celestialfunctionaries,and worshipisa dangerousactivityfitonlyforTheDragon-Blooded.ImmaculateMonksarereknown martial artists.>>>>

<<The Guild ≡An associationof mortal tradesmenandplutocrats,the Guild spans Creation,moving drugs, slaves,and sundries acrossTheworld.OneofThemostpowerfulEconomicforces,the Guildis governedalmost entirelyby mortals.They maintaintheSilverstandardofThedinarand promoteeconomic stability worldwideevenasTheypush opiumon entire nationsand enslave entire tribes.BasedoutofTheScavenger Lands,theyareatTimes opposedtoThe RealmAndatTimesworkinconcertwithit.>>>>
<< CultofThe Illuminated ≡ Creation-wide mysterycult devotedto worshipof mysterioussaviorswhoWillreturnTheworldto righteousness.OpposeTheImmaculateOrder.>>>>

<<The Realm ≡Themightiest empirein Creation,basedonThe Blessed Isleand ruledbythe Scarlet Dynasty,the Realm controls hundredsOfsatrapies acrossTheThreshold, nationsunderDragon-Bloodedboot.The RealmExtorts taxesand tributeFromalmostthe wholeofThe civilizedworld.>>>>

<<Fortitude ≡ Neutral;Fortitude ≡ Prison fortress-cityNorth;Strongestandmost ruthlessriseToThetop;NoLawbutwhatThestrong decree.Tribesof prisonersToilin darkness, harvesting plantsand gemsforThe gangsThatruntheprison.FortitudeisaplaceWherethe darknessis worshiped,thewinteris hated,andeveryman believesheis cursed.Itspeople believethatonlya heroiclifeand immortalDeathcanatonefora darkened soul.>>>>

<<Grieve ≡ Neutral;Grieve ≡Port-cityNorth;HomeToartisans, merchantsand laborers,andthealchemistswho discoveredtheWhite Elixir.TheWhite Elixir grantsaMacabre immortality, preservingbodyand soulInThe instantofdeath.Grieve’s richestcitizenswhoHaveprocuredthe Elixirare recognizablebytheir unusual pallorandthe parasolsTheyemploytoWardofftheSun.Foreigners arriveinincreasing numbersTo purchase immortality,tradeinThe Elixir’sreagents,orSeekwealth.>>>>

<<Lookshy ≡GreatcityinTheEastthatdatesbacktoThe Shogunate.ItisHomeToThe Seventh Legion,thepre- eminentmilitarypowerinTheScavenger Lands.Thestill possesssomefew craftsmenwhoCan maintainthestoreofFirstAgeWeapons. Visitors cannotenterThe UpperCitywithout authorization.>>>>

<<Sijan ≡Great tomb-cityonTheedgeofaShadowlandinTheEast.Funaralistshereare familiarwithallritesand ritualsrelatedtoDeath,buttheirultimateServiceisTo ensurethe ghostsOfThe deceased retainwealthandstatus.Great treasuresareentombed inThenecropoli,protectedby trapsand guardians.LiminalExaltedhavean alliancewithSijan.>>>>

<<Yu- Shan ≡ Heaven.The celestialcityofYu- ShanisHomeToThe godsandthe IncarnaeWho overseeThemanagementof Heaven, Creation,and fateThroughaGrand bureaucracy.OfTheExalted,onlytheSiderealExaltedcallitHome.>>>>

<< Underworld ≡ThelandsOfThedead, floatingonTheSeaofThevoid,the Underworldisa shattered reflectionof CreationandaCapstoneoverthetombsOfTheNeverborn.ThosewhoDieandare unabletoMoveon become trappedinThe Underworld,wherethe soulsand Essenceofdeadthingshave congregated,givingriseToMaladyand horror.ThisiswheretheDeathlordskeepTheir kingdoms.TheyhavebuiltTheirfortressesinto Creation;inEverydirection,theSpiresofaDeathlord’s Citadel peersout.>>>>

<<Shadowland ≡Wherethe Underworld touches Creation; PlaceswhereNo barrier existsbetweenlifeanddeath,andthelivingmay treatwiththeDead.ThosewhoLeaveaShadowlandduringtheDayfind themselvesin Creation,whilethosewhoLeaveits bordersatnightenterThe Underworld.>>>>

<<Scavenger Lands ≡The territoryinTheNearEastofTheThresholdwho proclaimindependencefromthe Realm,having resistedmultiple invasions.ItsheartisTheRiver Province,aRegioncontainingaSeriesof mighty, loosely alliedcity-statesliningthe mighty riversThatrunthroughtheheartofTheRegion.>>>>

<< Malfeas ≡Hell.A nightmarish kingdomof brassandobsidianundera sickeninggreenSky. Malfeas sitsoutsideTheworld, surroundedbyan endless desertatTheendsOf eternity.TheYoziswere imprisonedherewiththeirDemon legionsafterbeing vanquishedbytheExalted.WhenaDemonis summonedfrom Malfeasbya sorcerer,itmaycrossThe sandsOf eternityinjustfiveDays, departingfiveDaysin advanceofThe sorcerer’sCall.>>>>

<< Blessed Isle ≡Thegreat island- continentatThecenterof Creation,onceThehomeofThe godsandnowthe homelandofThe Realm.AtThecenterofTheworld,the PoleofEarth piercesThe heavensinTheformofThe Imperial Mountain.The PoleofEarthIsTheaxisof Creation,aroundwhichtheworld moves.Itis dormantand steady, balancingthe elementsOf CreationintoaStable harmony.Asone travelsawayfromthe PoleofEarth,the directionalpole’s influence grows strongeruntilrealityis rippedaway.>>>>
<<orichalcum ≡ magicalmaterial,superheavygoldattunedSolarExalted>>>>
<< moonsilver ≡ magicalmaterial, fluidicSilverattuned LunarExalted>>>>
<< Jade ≡ magicalmaterial,stoneattunedDragon-blooded>>>>
<<starmetal ≡ magicalmaterial,fromsky,attunedSiderealExalted>>>>
<< soulsteel ≡ magicalmaterial,from Underworld,attuned AbyssalExalted>>>>
<<Exaltuses Essence ⇒anima{ flares,visible};more essence ⇒ largerdisplay>>>><<Solar ⇒whiteorGold; Abyssal ⇒blackish- purple glow; Lunar ⇒silveranimalShape;Dragon-Blood ⇒ aspectelement>>>>
_synonyms
<< Charm:ExcellentStrike ≡Avery accurateattack.{Solar, Abyssal, Lunar,Sidereal,Terrestrial; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm:FireandStoneStrike ≡Anattackthat channels essenceintoFirethrougha meleeWeapon.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm:Peony BlossomAttack ≡Instant additionalattack.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm:DippingSwallowDefense ≡Verypowerfulparry.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm:BulwarkStance ≡ForaSingleTurn,you attemptaParryand reduceThedamageofall incomingattacks.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm:War LionStance ≡You chooseanotherpersonThenforTheRestofcombatyoucan attempttoParryanyattacksdirectedatthatperson.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm:Guard-Breaking Technique ≡ExecuteaFeintandthenstrikeaPowerfulblow.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm:SolarCounterattack ≡Whenparrying,theExaltmaylaunchAn immediatecounterattackbeforeanydamageis sustained.Thiscounterattackdoesnot preventdamagefromthe incomingattack.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
<< Charm: RisingSun Slash ≡Apowerful leapingattackwhich channelsan inexorableflowof EssenceThroughtheweapon, greatly boostingtheSpeedandferocityofTheattack.{Solar; Melee}>>>>
